Create Project
gcloud projects create my-text2sql-app GCP->>CLI: Configure project CLI->>CloudSQL: 2. Create Database Instance
Console → SQL → Create Instance CloudSQL->>CLI: Store credentials in Secret Manager CLI->>VertexAI: 3. Upload Model
gcloud ai models upload VertexAI->>CLI: Create Endpoint
gcloud ai endpoints create CLI->>CloudRun: 4. Deploy API Backend
FastAPI + Docker CloudRun->>CLI: Connect to DB & Model CLI->>NextJS: 5. Build & Deploy Frontend
Next.js to Cloud Run/Firebase NextJS->>User: 6. Access Application User->>NextJS: Submit Text Query NextJS->>CloudRun: Forward to API CloudRun->>VertexAI: Request SQL Generation VertexAI->>CloudSQL: Execute Generated SQL CloudSQL->>VertexAI: Return Results VertexAI->>CloudRun: Return Data CloudRun->>NextJS: Format Response NextJS->>User: Display Results
